text: Thomas Brodie-Sangster (born 16 May 1990), also known as Thomas Sangster, is an English actor. He played Sam in Love Actually (2003), Ferb Fletcher in Phineas and Ferb (2007–2015) and Jojen Reed in Game of Thrones (2013–2014). ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from London
title: Thomas Brodie-Sangster
